Description.Name: SRM Ammo (Containment)
Description.Details: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. Containment SRM Ammo Bins are reinforced to contain half of the destructive force when an ammunition explosion occurs, but contain only 72 rounds of ammunition per ton. Explosion damage per ammo: 1
